genresAdvancedInfo.name: xinyao
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Xinyao - Xinyao is a folk-pop music genre that originated in Singapore in the 1980s. It is characterized by its use of Mandarin lyrics and acoustic guitar accompaniment. Xinyao songs often focus on themes of love, friendship, and nostalgia, and are known for their simple melodies and heartfelt lyrics. Xinyao has since spread to other parts of Asia and continues to be popular among Chinese-speaking audiences.
